```python
def riffle_shuffle(n, r, operations):
    deck = list(range(n))
    for c in operations:
        deck_a = deck[:n//2 + n%2]
        deck_b = deck[n//2 + n%2:]
        deck_c = []
        while deck_a or deck_b:
            if len(deck_a) >= c:
                deck_c += deck_a[:c]
                deck_a = deck_a[c:]
            else:
                deck_c += deck_a
                deck_a = []
            if len(deck_b) >= c:
                deck_c += deck_b[:c]
                deck_b = deck_b[c:]
            else:
                deck_c += deck_b
                deck_b = []
        deck = deck_c
    return deck[-1]

t = 1
while t > 0:
    n, r = map(int, input().split())
    operations = list(map(int, input().split()))
    print(riffle_shuffle(n, r, operations))
    t -= 1
```
